name: Latest Gentoo for unrooted Android
short_description:
Overlay for Gentoo, hosting FEATURES=+uncooperative-root:
This complement of official gentoo portage tree will enable gentoo EPREFIX on computers without useful /bin/sh, /tmp, /usr/bin/env, /lib.

This is tested on ARM (Android) by me.

Besides an overlay, there will be .tbz2 packages for armv7j, and patchsets for the various Gentoo Project involved (#gentoo-moz, #gentoo-prefix, ...).

gentooandroid.sf.net was the first version: it took one year to get a working firefox, but the portage tree aged.

endrood.sf.net will work with latest portage tree.
summary: Overlay of packages for prefix Gentoo, working without /bin/sh, ...
